author: Daniel Greene
description:
Welcome to this week’s Fantasy News, where we cover the hottest updates in books, TV, movies, and more! From Neil Gaiman's latest controversy to exciting special editions and sneak peeks at upcoming shows, this episode is packed with must-know stories for fantasy and sci-fi fans. Don’t miss out on these breaking updates, and check the links for more details! 🎉

🎙️ Topics Covered:

00:00 Neil Gaiman Dropped by Publisher: Shocking developments surrounding the iconic author. https://www.bbc.com/news/articles/c2egnred4xxo.amp

00:54 Chuck Tingle’s New Book: The latest from the internet’s favorite satirical author. https://x.com/TorNightfire/status/1882835873424912698?s=19

02:15 China Miéville Special Edition: A gorgeous new release for collectors. https://bsky.app/profile/thebrokenbinding.bsky.social/post/3lgip6qy4yk2g

02:54 John Scalzi Special Edition: Another stunning collector’s item for fans. https://bsky.app/profile/thebrokenbinding.bsky.social/post/3lgip6qy4yk2g

03:22 Saga Doubl
title: Neil Gaiman Dropped By Dark Horse, Rings Of Power Crashes, Onyx Storm Debacle ~FN~
